title: 61. Homeschool questions ANSWERED | Can homeschoolers get into college? What are the laws? My curriculum
description:
Luke and I have been homeschooling our kids from the beginning. We've learned a lot (and changed a lot!) over the years. Today I am answering some of your top questions on educating our children. Â Â 
I am SO excited to support homeschool families in a whole new way, through the Simple Homes and Homeschools Facebook community! Â MEMBERSHIP FOR THE SIMPLE HOMES & HOMESCHOOLS GROUP- https://www.farmhouseonboone.com/simple-homes-and-homeschools Â Â 
WHAT: This is a private Facebook group that can be joined by paying a monthly membership fee Â 
LEADERS: The group is led by myself (Lisa from Farmhouse on Boone), Dawn from The Minimal Mom and Angela Braniff from This Gathered Nest. Â COST: $13/month (cancel anytime!) Â 
BENEFITS:Â 
â€“ Support for new and newer homeschooling parentsÂ 
â€“ Help with choosing curriculums, creating schedules, routines & homeschooling spacesÂ 
â€“ A printable homeschooling planner & supply list (additional pages will be added throughout the year) â€“ Ideas for simplifying your home & meal planning â€“ Daily video posts by the leaders with helpful information, encouragement, tips & supportÂ 
â€“ Monthly group focuses with printables â€“ The ability to share your progress, questions & wins- we CANâ€™T WAIT to celebrate with you!Â 
â€“ The opportunity to ask questions specific to your process & familyÂ 
â€“ Twice monthly Facebook live Q&A sessions with the leaders & other guests (Replays available for those unable to view live) Questions may be submitted prior to the session or during it.Â 
â€“ Content organized into â€œunitsâ€ so that itâ€™s easy to find and re-visitÂ 
â€“ Weekly Highlight emails so you know that you didnâ€™t miss anything important ğŸ™‚ Â Not sure if itâ€™s for you? Youâ€™re free to cancel anytime! Join, take a look around. If you like it, keep it. If not, cancel anytime, no hard feelings ğŸ˜‰
